    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AccordionModule
    Accordion module for collapsible content sections.
    AccordionModule.AccordionItem
     
    AccountBarBuilder
    Builder for creating account/user bars.
    AccountWidget
    Account widget component for displaying user authentication status.
    Alert
    Alert component for displaying notifications and messages.
    Alert.AlertType
     
    Attribute
    Represents an HTML attribute with a name and value.
    Audio
    Audio component for embedding audio content.
    AuthorizationChecker
    Interface for authorization checks in the editing system.
    AuthWrapper
    Optional authentication/authorization wrapper for edit operations.
    Badge
    Badge component for displaying small labels and counts.
    Badge.BadgeStyle
     
    BannerBuilder
    Builder for creating flexible top banners with multiple layout options.
    BannerBuilder.BannerLayout
    Layout mode for the banner.
    BannerBuilder.TextAlignment
    Text alignment for overlay banners.
    Blockquote
    Blockquote component for quoted text.
    Breadcrumb
    Breadcrumb navigation component for showing hierarchical navigation.
    Button
    Button component with various styles and types.
    Button.ButtonStyle
     
    Button.ButtonType
     
    CalloutModule
    Callout module for highlighted informational boxes.
    CalloutModule.CalloutType
     
    Card
    Card component for displaying content in a contained, styled box.
    CardGrid
    Grid container for displaying multiple cards.
    Checkbox
    Checkbox input component.
    Code
    Code component for displaying code snippets.
    Column
    Column component for controlling column width and behavior in a Row.
    Comment
    Comment component for displaying individual comments.
    CommentThread
    Thread of comments with support for nested replies.
    ComparisonModule
    Comparison module for side-by-side comparisons.
    ComparisonModule.ComparisonColumn
     
    ComparisonModule.ComparisonRow
     
    Component
    Base interface for all renderable UI components in the Java HTML Framework.
    Container
    Container component for constraining content width.
    Container.ContainerSize
     
    ContentModule
    Module for displaying content (text, markdown, etc.)
    DataModule<T>
    Module for displaying data in tables.
    DataTable<T>
    DataTable component for displaying structured data from objects.
    Div
     
    Divider
    Divider component for creating horizontal or vertical visual separators.
    Divider.DividerOrientation
     
    Divider.DividerStyle
     
    Divider.DividerThickness
     
    Dropdown
    Generic dropdown component for creating hover-based dropdown menus.
    DynamicCardModule
    Dynamic card module that can be rendered with specific content.
    DynamicListModule
    Dynamic list module that can be rendered with specific items.
    DynamicTableModule
    Dynamic table module that can be rendered with specific data.
    EditableModule
    Wrapper that adds edit/delete buttons to any module.
    EditablePage
    Page wrapper that adds page-building UI for managing rows and modules.
    EditableRow
    Row wrapper that adds page-building UI for managing modules within a row.
    EditAdapter<T>
    Interface for modules that support editing.
    EditFormBuilder
    Utility to auto-generate edit forms from slot mappings.
    EditModalBuilder
    Helper for building standardized edit modals.
    EditMode
    Defines editing behavior modes for editable modules.
    Form
    Form component for wrapping input elements.
    Form.Method
     
    FormFieldHelper
    Helper for building consistent form fields in EditAdapter implementations.
    FormModule
    Module for creating forms.
    ForumModule
    Module for displaying forum posts.
    ForumPost
    Forum post component for displaying individual forum posts.
    Gallery
    Gallery component for displaying a grid of images.
    GalleryModule
    Module for displaying image galleries.
    Grid
    Grid layout for creating responsive grid layouts.
    Header
    Header component for text headings with alignment and decoration options.
    Header.Alignment
     
    Header.HeaderLevel
     
    HeroModule
    Hero module for creating prominent banner/header sections.
    HtmlTag
    Abstract base class for all HTML tag components in the framework.
    Icon
    Icon component wrapper for icon fonts and SVG icons.
    Icon.IconLibrary
     
    Icon.Size
     
    Image
    Image component for displaying images.
    InfoBox
    InfoBox component for displaying highlighted information.
    Label
    Label component for form labels and general text labels.
    Link
    Link component for creating hyperlinks.
    ListItem
    Simple list item component for list content.
    Markdown
     
    Modal
    Overlay modal component with backdrop.
    Module
    Abstract base class for high-level reusable modules in the framework.
    ModuleEditHandler<T>
    Interface for handling module edit/update/delete operations.
    NavBar
    Navigation bar component.
    NavBar.NavItem
     
    OrderedList
    Ordered list component.
    Page
     
    Page.PageBuilder
     
    Paragraph
    Paragraph component for text content with alignment options.
    Paragraph.Alignment
     
    PostList
    List of forum posts component.
    ProgressBar
    Progress bar component for showing completion progress.
    ProgressBar.ColorType
     
    QuoteModule
    Quote module for displaying testimonials, quotes, or highlighted text.
    RadioGroup
    Radio button group component.
    RawHtml
    Renders trusted HTML without escaping.
    RenderContext
    A container for per-request values used to fill SlotKeys during rendering.
    RenderContext.RenderContextBuilder
     
    RichContentModule
    Rich content module that can contain paragraphs, images, and links.
    Row
     
    Section
    Section component for semantic page sections.
    Select
    Select dropdown component.
    Select.Option
     
    ShellBuilder
    Comprehensive builder for creating the entire application shell/layout.
    SideNav
    Side navigation component specifically designed for vertical navigation.
    SideNav.NavItem
     
    SideNav.Section
     
    SideNavBuilder
    Builder for creating side navigation bars.
    SimpleListModule
    Simple list module demonstrating container pattern with list items.
    Slot<T>
    A component that renders a value from the RenderContext.
    SlotKey<T>
    A typed key for accessing values in a RenderContext.
    SlotKeyMap
    Container for slot data with runtime type safety and default merging.
    Spacer
    Spacer component for adding vertical or horizontal spacing between elements.
    Spacer.SpacerSize
     
    Spacer.SpacerType
     
    Spinner
    Spinner component for loading indicators.
    Spinner.Size
     
    StatsModule
    Module for displaying statistics and metrics in a grid layout.
    StatsModule.Stat
     
    Style
    Fluent API for building CSS styles and classes.
    Table
    Table component for displaying tabular data.
    Table.Cell
     
    Table.Row
     
    TabsModule
    Tabs module for organizing content into tabbed panels.
    TabsModule.Tab
     
    Tag
    Tag component for categorization and labeling.
    Template
    A reusable template for rendering components with dynamic content.
    TemplateComponent
    Adapter class that wraps a Template and a RenderContext to make them usable as a standard Component.
    TextArea
    TextArea component for multi-line text input.
    TextInput
    Text input component for single-line text entry.
    TextInput.InputType
     
    TextNode
    TextNode component for rendering plain text without any HTML tags.
    TimelineModule
    Timeline module for displaying chronological events.
    TimelineModule.Orientation
     
    TimelineModule.TimelineEvent
     
    TopBannerBuilder
    Builder for creating top banners with optional image, title, subtitle, and custom styling.
    TopNavBuilder
    Builder for creating top navigation bars.
    TypedValue
    Wraps a slot value with runtime type information for safety.
    UnorderedList
    Unordered list component.
    ValidationResult
    Result of form validation for editable modules.
    Video
    Video component for embedding video content.
